name: I'm always right (Co-Op Adventure)
description:
Father And His Son Journey (co-op Adventure) I'm always right , it's a co-op adventure game, and in the game, you control a father and his son trapped in a time loop. You join their lives and see the result of disobeying the party !!! Nothing is hidden from the party. The party is always watching over you. You have always surrendered to the party, but you do not know.

   

Join our discord  channel and share your thoughts about the game with us!
